name: Wood Puzzle Block Classic
description:
"Wood puzzle block can keep you mentally fit every day.
Take a break at any time with this calming free puzzle，No time limit.
It is very relaxing. So awesome” You can pop the blocks anytime and anywhere.
Get hooked on this brain exercise with Great sound effects free wood-style puzzle game!

How to play wood puzzle block？
- wood blocks cannot be rotated.
- Place the wooden blocks into board.
- The blocks are crushed when you fill in a vertical or horizontal line.
- After the block disappears ，freeing up space for new pieces. The game will continue
- The more wood blocks eliminated you can, the more scores you will get.
- Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

This is a fun and classic addictive wood-style block puzzle game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and addictive.
It will improve your cognitive abilities such as attention, concentration and logic reasoning.

Why choose this wood puzzle block?
- Wood style blocks.
- Support World Leaderboard.
- Simple rules and Easy control.
- Support both Phones and Tablets.
- Free classic brick puzzle game and not need Wifi

It can help you emotionally re-charge, reduce stress and increase positive social interactions, all while having a great time.
Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy wood-style puzzle together!"
